channel.title: Really badly need this code solved 6 errors
channel.description:
This is in my playerhandler.java I just put it there for when It restarts server it doesnt rollback. Im having some errors though can anyone help with the errors
[code]Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() { public void run() { for (int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) if(players[i] != null) ((Client)players[i]).savegame(false); } });[/code]
[code]PlayerHandler.java:157: <identifier> expected Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() ^ PlayerHandler.java:157: ';' expected Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() ^ PlayerHandler.java:159: illegal start of expression public void run() ^ PlayerHandler.java:159: illegal start of expression public void run() ^ PlayerHandler.java:159: ';' expected public void run() ^ PlayerHandler.java:165: illegal start of type }); ^ 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Really badly need this code solved 6 errors

did you make any other changes other than this?

Nope only that, any other changes i should do

item.title: Really badly need this code solved 6 errors
item.dc:creator: @iLuckyBeaTz iLuckyBeaTz
item.description:
@iLuckyBeaTz wrote:

[quote=“josh225, post:3, topic:401259”][quote author=iLuckyBeaTz link=topic=498322.msg3644164#msg3644164 date=1309243544]
This is in my playerhandler.java I just put it there for when It restarts server it doesnt rollback. Im having some errors though can anyone help with the errors

Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() { public void run() { for (int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) if(players[i] != null) ((Client)players[i]).savegame(false); } });

[/quote]

the last line }); remove the end bracket and the semi-colon and try again[/quote]
that fixed 1 error thanks still got the other 5 and i backedup the whole file before editing

Read full topic
